title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Brooklyn, New York
content:
Photo submitted by Jared Lauridsen, “Brooklyn, NY, overlooking what was a well-spinning wind turbine, despite what the still shows. I hope we can give shared bikes some love!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The […]

author: Kristi Benedict
